text: The 1994 UCI Track Cycling World Championships were the World Championship for track cycling. They took place in Palermo, Italy in August 1994. Eleven events were contested, eight for men and three for women. ==Medal summary== {| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's Events |- |Men's sprint ||Marty Nothstein ||Darryn Hill ||Michael Hübner |- | ||Florian Rousseau ||Erin Hartwell ||Shane Kelly |- |Men's keirin ||Marty Nothstein ||Michael Hübner ||Federico Paris |- |Men's points race |Silvio Martinello |Remigijus Lupeikis |Sergei Laurenenko |- | ||Chris Boardman ||Francis Moreau ||Jens Lehmann |- |Men's team pursuit || Andreas Bach Guido Fulst Jens Lehmann Danilo Hondo || Mariano Friedick Dirk Copeland Carl Sundquist Adam Laurent || Brett Aitken Stuart O'Grady Rodney McGee Tim O'Shannessey |- |Men's tandem || Fabrice Colas Frédéric Magné || Emanuel Raasch Jens Glücklich || Federico Paris Roberto Chiappa |- |Men's motor-paced ||Carsten Podlesch ||Roland Königshofer ||Alessandro Tresin |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Women's Events |- |Women's sprint ||Galina Yenyukhina ||Felicia Ballanger ||Oksana Grishina |- |Women's points race ||Ingrid Haringa ||Svetlana Samokhvalova ||Ludmilla Gorojanskaja |- |Women's individual pursuit ||Marion Clignet ||Svetlana Samokhvalova ||Janie Eickhoff |} ==Medal table== ==See also== * 1994 UCI Road World Championships ==References== Uci Track Cycling World Championships, 1994 Track cycling Category:UCI Track Cycling World Championships by year Category:International cycle races hosted by Italy Category:Sport in Palermo Category:August 1994 sports events in Europe
title: 1994 UCI Track Cycling World Championships
